subject: Re: Maybe they have a sense of humor?
author: trilobitegal
full_text:
Hi, Frank - Am sure many appreciated this communication, but have just been too busy with Easter to do much on the web.  I got a similar answer, but in a deep voice, when I asked for a cure for a specific type of cancer - lol!  I have a bunch of comedians around here. 

--- In EVP-ITC@...m, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  I mean--get a voice that seems to be really cool, and not one frikin'
> person to share to with. I am not about to spend every waking moment after I
> retire building boxes for bozos that seek only fame and fortune, and only
> want a box to show off on all kinds of duffus shows, and never use the damn
> thing for anykind of intelligent communcation from the other side.
> 
>  What torques my jaws is I get stuff that shows they manipulate the
> broadcast fragments to form messages and phrases, and I might well
> demonstrate it to my dogs, as it is always ignored on all groups.  Everyone
> is too damn busy doing shows and bogus investigations to actually figure out
> how this stuff works. How to turn it to profit is the only question on most
> minds here.
> 
>  For the one in 12 million that might be curious, they took athe ad fore
> Rosetta Stone software "the natural way to learn a foreign language" and
> changed it to "the natural way to learn---sex!". Not demon enough, or ghost
> hunters enough for most I guess.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
